lines.text: If you never see me again will you be sad? Will you be tortured by the memory of having been with me? Will you become obsessed? Will you be maudlin? And anti-social? Will you get into fights?

[talking to a stranger walking by]
Hey! Will you marry me? Please.
Why do you wanna marry me?
I could think of a lot of reasons if I weren't so drunk.
I dunno. The nights are too long.
The nights are too long because you have no one to share them with.
Listen pal, you can't waltz in here--use my toaster-- and start spouting universal truths, without qualification!

[to Henry]
Eat your toast and get out.
'To live just move forward to those you love'
But knowledge won't help you where you're going.
What's the distinction between faith and love?
Love without faith is merely infatuation.
Infatuation... infatuation... such a beautiful word.
The trouble with Americans is that they always want a tragedy with a happy ending.
